TopicTitle: Undocking spacecraft causes lose of signal to the undocked craft.

Articles.Content: I noticed sometimes when you undock a craft from a docking port the craft that was undocked will have no communication signal. I can sometimes solve this by toggling the antenna or by reloading a prior save and trying again.
Yes, I also experience the same bug. A workaround, as you yourself said is to toggle the antena in the parts manager
I also experienced this same bug, however toggling the antenna did not work for me.
